Description_lang: Blackhand throws Slag Bombs at several nearby enemies, attaching the bomb to the target. Slag Bombs arm after $156035d., a triggered Slag Bomb inflicts $156044s1 Fire damage to enemies within $156044A1 yards of the bomb, applying Slagged and creating a Slag Hole.
AuraDescription_lang: Blackhand throws Slag Bombs at several nearby locations. Slag Bombs arm after $156035d., a triggered Slag Bomb inflicts $156044s1 Fire damage to enemies within $156044A1 yards of the bomb, applying Slagged.
